Comments_List: I further developed my Russian grammar and vocabulary, grew more comfortable speaking on a wider range of topics, and learned more about Russian culture
My only issue with the course was the nature of the heavy homework courseload. The assignments often felt more like busywork than positive contributions to my ability to use Russian in natural ways.
The class was well taught and the homework facilitated my learning.
Yes, Professor Dolgova is a phenomenal teacher who will help you with your Russian no matter where your Russian skills are coming into the class.

If they want to learn Russian, definitely. The homework took around 1.5 - 2 hours every day. Professor Dolgova challenges you but is always there to help. There is not a huge amount of conversation practice in class, but frequent office hours provide an opportunity to practice conversation.
Yes! Irina put so much time and effort into teaching this course and made it so enjoyable
